subject: Project Kickoff: SmartCool Pro
content:
Team,

I am thrilled to officially launch the SmartCool Pro project. Our mission is to revolutionize the kitchen with a "Zero Waste" smart fridge powered by embedded AI.

Key Objectives:

  • Integrate Raspberry Pi & YOLOv8 for real-time inventory tracking.
  • Develop a user-friendly mobile app for recipe suggestions.
  • Validate our "Agile Hardware" approach with 2-week sprints.

Let's make this a reality!

Best,
Noah

subject: Budget Approval Request
content:
Dear Board Members,

Following the feasibility and risk reviews, I am submitting the formal budget request for the SmartCool Pro industrialization phase.

Request Summary:

  • Total Budget: €251,615
  • CAPEX (€98,500): Tooling, certification, and test bench investments.
  • OPEX (€153,115): Six-month run covering engineering, cloud, and the initial BOM for the pilot build.

This envelope keeps us on track for a Q2 pilot and aligns with the updated Gantt, skills, and risk plans.

Sincerely,
Noah

subject: Order Inquiry: Compute Module 5
content:
Dear Sales Team,

We are interested in placing an order for 500 units of the Compute Module 5 (4GB RAM) for our upcoming pilot production of the SmartCool Pro.

Could you please provide:

  • Current lead times and availability.
  • Volume pricing for 500 and 1000 units.
  • Technical datasheets regarding thermal dissipation requirements.

We are looking to finalize our BOM by next week.

Best regards,
Marc Moreau
